features: 💡【Small Lamp Save Space 】The small industrial table lamp is 3.5 inch (H) x 4.8 inch (W). Small desk lamp does not require a lamp shade, making it easy to create old-fashioned atmosphere at home. Place on a desk or bedside table as a small night light. Stable performance and long service life (Bulb Not Included).
💡【Retro Style Look】Industrial desk lamp is constructed of high quality metal body and ceramic socket that creates the antique and vintage look. This charming design added industrialized touch.

💡【Fit E26 E27 Light Bulbs】Perfect for any E26 E27 Edison bulbs. And the industrial lamp is also compatible with a variety of incandescent, halogen bulbs, LED or CFL light bulb. You can customize the bulbs of the vintage desk lamp you like. To get the complete industrial look, recommend to use a decorative edison or vintage bulb.
💡【Wide Application】The small table lamp base can be use in study room, bedroom, living room, dining room, hallway, balcony, bar, cafe, shop, etc. Compatibble voltage: 110-220V, Wattage: Max 120W.
💡 Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions of our vintage desk light. We are available 24/7 to solve any of your product related issues.
body.description: Small Industrial Lamp Base E26/E27 Ceramic Base Holder Our edison table lamp can be used as a reading lamp, daylight lamp, nightstand table lamp, bedroom desk lamp, small bedside lamp, garage lamp, kitchen lamp. Beautiful Lamp Base For Decarating Perfect décor for your beautiful house that adds a touch of industrialized feeling to living room, dining room, family room, bedroom, girls room, den, hallway, balcony, office etc. Provide you warm surrounding at home and a small pretty lamp to decrate your bedroom. We believe children, young and greybeard will like this industrial table lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vintage Charm and Exceptional Quality - A Five-Star Find!
reviews.reviewText: The YXTH Industrial Table Lamp Base has exceeded my expectations in every way possible. This vintage-inspired lamp base is a true gem, and here's why I can't stop raving about it.First and foremost, the ceramic base exudes a timeless charm that perfectly complements my decor. Its vintage aesthetic adds character and warmth to any room. It's not just a lamp; it's a statement piece that elevates the entire ambiance.The build quality is exceptional. The ceramic base is sturdy and well-crafted, ensuring that it will stand the test of time. It's clear that YXTH prioritizes durability and attention to detail in their products.The E26/E27 base holder provides versatility in choosing the perfect light bulb to suit my needs and style preferences. Whether I'm looking for soft, ambient lighting or a brighter, task-oriented glow, this lamp base accommodates it all.Installation was a breeze. The lamp base securely holds the light bulb in place, and the on/off switch is conveniently located for easy access. It's user-friendly and hassle-free, which is always a plus.The compact size of the lamp base makes it a versatile addition to any space. It fits perfectly on my desk, bedside table, or even as a decorative accent on a shelf. Its presence is felt without overpowering the room.The vintage aesthetic seamlessly blends with various decor styles, allowing for endless creative possibilities. Whether you're going for a rustic farmhouse look or a more eclectic, bohemian vibe, this lamp base adapts effortlessly.In terms of value, the YXTH Industrial Table Lamp Base offers a superb price-to-quality ratio. It's a high-quality piece that doesn't break the bank, making it a smart investment for anyone seeking both style and durability.In summary, I can't sing enough praises for the YXTH Industrial Table Lamp Base. Its vintage charm, exceptional build quality, and versatile design make it a standout addition to any living space. If you're in search of a quality lamp base that combines style and functionality, look no further. This is a five-star find that I wholeheartedly recommend to fellow decor enthusiasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CERAMIC TREE RELACEMENT CORD/BASE
reviews.reviewText: This base lamp works perfectly for my ceramic tree. Cord is very good quality as well as included on/off switch. Original base on tree was damaged and cord a little shabby. To replace as original, quite costly. Tree set perfectly on lamp base and looks nice. Base, cord replacement $10.00. These vintage trees worth some investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works exactly as intended
reviews.reviewText: I used this item to repurpose/upcycle a glass lampshade (from a broken lamp) into a table sconce. The price was fantastic! Especially considering what it would have cost to get a new lamp. It seems well-made and sturdy. Takes a standard socket bulb. Plus, there is a choice of colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Looking Lamp With Poor Construction
reviews.reviewText: Updated Review: After writing my initial review, the manufacturer reached out to me and wanted to set things right since the initial products I received did not work as intended. I received another lamp and it worked just as advertised. No loose bolts, and the socket seems set in place. I appreciate their commitment to the product, and the new one sent to me was in perfect working order, so I'm giving them another star.Aesthetically, these lamps look pretty good. The brushed brass looks pretty good and has decent coloration. As far as working as a lamp, they work well. The in-line switch works to turn the light on and off, and no issues with flickering while lights are on. My issues with these lamps are the quality of construction. I ordered two and both came with loose screws to hold the socket to the spot where it connects to the electricity. After tightening the screws, I figured it was fine, but then I realized that the socket mechanism is not actually attached to the lamp base. When I tried to unscrew the bulbs, the sockets just spun within the base. I had to find a way to isolate the socket so I could unscrew the bulb without putting too much pressure on the bulb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little light
reviews.reviewText: I bought this light to set up a lightbulb security camera and it worked out perfectly for the area I wanted it for. Very sturdy and well made for the price. I definitely recommend.Seller sent it quickly and with care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can be used for any type of light situation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Minimalist but exactly what I wanted. Wish it was touch activated and had the option to dim as it is very bright but overall I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Important component(bulb) missing.
reviews.reviewText: I like the design and size of the lamp.The problem that I encountered was the picture of the lamp including an Edison bulb. The lamp came without the bulb.The appropriate bulb cost as much as the lamp at a specialty bulb store.
It looks ugly (cheap and ordinary), plus it's expensive for the quality.
